ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] My source of income
ygData.msgSnippet: Good thing you re not on The Tribunal bc I ve been wiping out every cent my lvl 11 Bard can kill in CB. I d hate to have to compete with you. but I m not
ygData.messageBody:
Good thing you're not on The Tribunal bc I've been wiping out every cent my
lvl 11 Bard can kill in CB. I'd hate to have to compete with you. but I'm
not selling the belts. :-)
luv,
-Su

> Starting Friday...I'm going to sit in Crushbone for two hours and see how
> many pp I can get if I really try to kill every centurian I can find and
> sell each belt for 1pp.
>
> Oh and I'm using a level 17 Druid Sarakan on the Bertoxx server
>
> If I make enough money...I'm afraid I'll be one of those who sit in an
area
> and farm the belts/pads for a living :>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
